item.title: Why I started this site
item.description: I was listening to a podcast between Zach Miko and Klevin Davis where they started talking about toxic masculinity and a lack of a positive men’s body movement. Zach and Klevin challenged men to talking about their feelings and spreading the message that you don’t need to bottle your emotions and burying them deep.Â Challenge Accepted. I love this and I think it IS an important message that needs to be spread.
